cluster_relations.rel_desc: Forensic technological advancements improve the accuracy of forensic analysis.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject causes an increase in the quality, performance, or effectiveness of the object.
remarks: Refers back to previously mentioned tools like SEM and mass spectrometry as part of advancements.
Refers back to previously mentioned tools like SEM and mass spectrometry as part of advancements.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Forensic technological advancements improve the reliability of forensic analysis.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject causes an increase in the quality, performance, or effectiveness of the object.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Advancing forensic technology enhances the sophistication and effectiveness of the art of forensic science.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject causes an increase in the quality, performance, or effectiveness of the object.
remarks: Technology entity represents 'forensic technology and technological advancements' derived from 'As technology continues to advance'.
Technology entity represents 'forensic technology and technological advancements' derived from 'As technology continues to advance'.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Development of new techniques improves the art of forensic science.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject causes an increase in the quality, performance, or effectiveness of the object.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The art of forensic science is expected to become more sophisticated and effective during the future time period.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that a practice, competence, or concept is expected to change or evolve over a specified future time period.
remarks: Relation created mainly to attach the temporal qualifier to the evolution of forensic science.
Relation created mainly to attach the temporal qualifier to the evolution of forensic science.

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject changes or evolves over the temporal period represented by the object.
args.justification: The current canonical_rel_desc is overly specific to future time periods, while the predicate itself is general to any temporal span. Renaming the predicate from 'changes_during' to 'changes_over_time' and generalizing the description makes the relation reusable for any temporal evolution scenario, while preserving its temporality semantics.
args.remark: Generalized the temporal evolution predicate so it can be applied beyond explicitly future periods.

executed_decisions.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject changes or evolves over the temporal period represented by the object.
executed_decisions.justification: The current canonical_rel_desc is overly specific to future time periods, while the predicate itself is general to any temporal span. Renaming the predicate from 'changes_during' to 'changes_over_time' and generalizing the description makes the relation reusable for any temporal evolution scenario, while preserving its temporality semantics.
executed_decisions.remark: Generalized the temporal evolution predicate so it can be applied beyond explicitly future periods.
